0.5.name: wordpress/wpgplus
0.5.description:
WPGPlus posts your blog posts to Google+ when published on WordPress blog.

Posts are made to "Public" circle. If you include an excerpt (using the post excerpt box, not just the "teaser" before the tag) it will be used, otherwise post-content is used.

This plugin requires PHP 5 and a compatible transport layer for WordPress HTTP API - most likely this means cURL.

Still working on cleaning up the output, working on getting Google+ to recognize the links posted, show images, etc.

This plugin is based on Dmitry Sandalov's standalone PHP script for publishing to Google+ from php.
